data.title: Best psychological-thriller movies to watch on Netflix
data.meta_description: Explore engaging psychological thrillers on Netflix with IMDb ratings of 6.5 & above. Immerse yourself in these enthralling movies for an exciting & suspenseful experience.
data.text:
This story includes a cunning scammer who becomes fixated on living a lavish life, triggering identity theft and manipulation, leading to a dangerous spiral of lies.

Based on Gillian Flynn's bestselling novel of the same name, this story comes from her acclaimed book.

In this Netflix movie, a couple tries to revive their relationship at a remote lake house, but things take a dark twist.

A Scottish Highlands hunting trip, where two friends face a tragic accident, leading to lies & manipulation as they hide the truth.

Part of the popular Black Mirror series, it delves into the concepts of free will, the influence of technology, and the essence of reality in a distinct manner.

The movie delves into the primal instinct of survival amidst an unseen threat, which is adopted from Josh Malerman's novel of the same name.
